meanings.definition: The quality or state of being jagged.
meanings.sent1: The jaggednesses of the rocks made it difficult to climb.
meanings.sent2: I could feel the jaggednesses of the broken glass under my feet.
meanings.sent3: The jaggednesses of the puzzle pieces made it challenging to put them together.
meanings.sent4: Her words had a jaggednesses that cut through the silence.
meanings.sent5: The artist captured the jaggednesses of the mountains in his painting.

meanings.definition: The jagged edges or surfaces of something.
meanings.sent1: Be careful of the jaggednesses of the metal sheet.
meanings.sent2: The jaggednesses of the torn paper made it difficult to handle.
meanings.sent3: The jaggednesses of the broken mirror reflected the sunlight in all directions.
meanings.sent4: The jaggednesses of the cliff made it a challenging climb.
meanings.sent5: The jaggednesses of the old fence were a hazard to anyone passing by.
